name: All the Little Things Count, Lc

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: All the Little Things Count, Lc is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Wharton, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $26.5M in Medicaid payments across 134K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $26.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
